help-file.title: DAZZLE
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Dazzle" surrounds the caster with brilliant sparkling light. Anyone physically attacking the caster runs the risk of getting partially blinded by the dazzling lights, making them less able to defend themselves from physical attacks in return.
